Replace.Text: 造纸坊
Lumbering Workshop
石匠坊
Stonemason Workshop
冶炼坊
Smeltery Workshop
轻工业厂
Light Factory
原料工厂
Raw Material Factory
军事工厂
Military Factory
流水线工厂
Assembly Line Factory
自动化工厂
Automated Factory
城市内的每处伐木场为该建筑+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力，若伐木场与造纸坊相邻，则额外+2 [ICON_Production] 生产力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到3个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

Each Lumber Mill improvement in the city provides +1 [ICON_Production] Production to this building. Gains an additional +2 [ICON_Production] Production if the Lumber Mill is adjacent to this building.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 3 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Industrial Zone Tier 1 building.
城市内的每处采石场为该建筑+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力，若采石场与石匠坊相邻，则额外+2 [ICON_Production] 生产力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到3个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

Each Quarry improvement in the city provides +1 [ICON_Production] Production to this building. Gains an additional +2 [ICON_Production] Production if the Quarry is adjacent to this building.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 3 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Industrial Zone Tier 1 building.
城市内的每处矿山为该建筑+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力，若矿山与冶炼坊相邻，则额外+2 [ICON_Production] 生产力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到3个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

Each Mine improvement in the city provides +1 [ICON_Production] Production to this building. Gains an additional +2 [ICON_Production] Production if the Mine is adjacent to this building.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 3 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Industrial Zone Tier 1 building.
帝国境内的每处改良过且位于工业区两个单元格范围内的奢侈品资源为所有轻工业厂+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]内卷化：每个轻工业厂使所有轻工业厂-1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到4个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

Each improved Luxury resource within 2 tiles of an Industrial Zone provides +1 [ICON_Production] Production for all Light Factories in the empire.[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]Industry competition: Each Light Factory -1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for all Light Factories.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 4 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Factory building.
帝国境内的每处改良过且位于工业区两个单元格范围内的战略资源为所有原料工厂+2 [ICON_Production] 生产力。[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]内卷化：每个原料工厂使所有原料工厂-1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到4个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

Each improved Strategic resource within 2 tiles of an Industrial Zone provides +2 [ICON_Production] Production for all Raw Material Factories in the empire.[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]Industry competition: Each Raw Material Factory -1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for all Raw Material Factories.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 4 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Factory building.
帝国境内每个位于工业区两个单元格范围内的军营、港口和航空港为所有军事工厂+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]内卷化：每个军事工厂使所有军事工厂-1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到4个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

Each Encampment, Harbor, and Aerodrome within 2 tiles of an Industrial Zone provides +1 [ICON_Production] Production for all Military Factories in the empire.[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]Industry competition: Each Military Factory -1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for all Military Factories.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 4 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Factory building.

将任意数额的 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] 煤自动转换为 [ICON_Power] 电力，每回合可为周围5个单元格内的城市提供其所需电力：[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1点 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] 煤 [ICON_PowerRight] 6点 [ICON_Power] 电力[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]会向大气层排放大量二氧化碳[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到5个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的“发电厂”建筑获得加成）。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]环境保护模式下，由于环境污染，本城市的所有单元格-1魅力。[ENDCOLOR]

Automatically converts any amount of [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] Coal into [ICON_Power] Power for cities within 5 tiles that need it each turn, at the rate of:[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] Coal [ICON_PowerRight] 6 [ICON_Power] Power[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Heavy CO2 into the atmosphere.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 5 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Power Plant building.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]Under Environmental Conservation mode, -1 appeal for all tiles in this city due to environmental pollution.[ENDCOLOR]

将任意数额的 [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] 石油自动转换为 [ICON_Power] 电力，每回合可为周围5个单元格内的城市提供其所需电力：[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1点 [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] 石油 [ICON_PowerRight] 9点 [ICON_Power] 电力[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]会向大气层排放中量二氧化碳[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到5个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的“发电厂”建筑获得加成）。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]环境保护模式下，由于环境污染，本城市的所有单元格-1魅力。[ENDCOLOR]

Automatically converts any amount of [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] Oil into [ICON_Power] Power for cities within 5 tiles that need it each turn, at the rate of:[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1 [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] Oil [ICON_PowerRight] 9 [ICON_Power] Power[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Moderate CO2 into the atmosphere[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 5 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Power Plant building.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]Under Environmental Conservation mode, -1 appeal for all tiles in this city due to environmental pollution.[ENDCOLOR]

将任意数额的 [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM] 铀自动转换为 [ICON_Power] 电力，每回合可为周围5个单元格内的城市提供其所需电力：[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1点 [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM] 铀 [ICON_PowerRight] 12点 [ICON_Power] 电力[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]会向大气层排放少量二氧化碳[NEWLINE]建成后发生核事故的概率会随着核电站老化而增加。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到5个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的“发电厂”建筑获得加成）。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_CULTURE]环境保护模式下，不会造成环境污染。[ENDCOLOR]

Automatically converts any amount of [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM] Uranium into [ICON_Power] Power for cities within 5 tiles that need it each turn, at the rate of:[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1 [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM] Uranium [ICON_PowerRight] 12 [ICON_Power] Power[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Miniscule CO2 into the atmosphere[NEWLINE]Once built, as a Nuclear Power Plant ages, there is an increased chance for a Nuclear Accident to occur. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 5 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Power Plant building.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_CULTURE]Under Environmental Conservation mode, this building will not cause environmental pollution.[ENDCOLOR]

将任意数额的 [ICON_RESOURCE_JNR_BATTERY_CHARGE] 可再生能源自动转换为 [ICON_Power] 电力，每回合可为周围5个单元格内的城市提供其所需电力：[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1点 [ICON_RESOURCE_JNR_BATTERY_CHARGE] 可再生能源 [ICON_PowerRight] 9点 [ICON_Power] 电力。[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]不会向大气排放二氧化碳。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到5个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的“发电厂”建筑获得加成）。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_CULTURE]环境保护模式下，不会造成环境污染。[ENDCOLOR]

Automatically converts any amount of [ICON_RESOURCE_JNR_BATTERY_CHARGE] Renewable energy into [ICON_Power] Power for cities within 5 tiles that need it each turn, at the rate of:[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1 [ICON_RESOURCE_JNR_BATTERY_CHARGE] Renewable energy [ICON_PowerRight] 9 [ICON_Power] Power[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]No CO2 into the atmosphere.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 5 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Power Plant building.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_CULTURE]Under Environmental Conservation mode, this building will not cause environmental pollution.[ENDCOLOR]
可再生能源发电厂
Renewable Energy Power Plant
城市中每个 [ICON_Citizen] 公民提供+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到6个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

+1 [ICON_Production] Production per [ICON_Citizen] Citizen in the city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 6 tiles that do not already have a bonus from an Industrial Zone Tier 4 building.
每个 [ICON_Citizen] 专家提供的 [ICON_Production] 生产力是平时的两倍。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到6个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

Specialists provide double [ICON_Production] Production.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 6 tiles that do not already have a bonus from an Industrial Zone Tier 4 building.
可再生能源提取厂
Renewable energy collection center
本城的每处可再生资源改良设施可提供+1 [ICON_RESOURCE_JNR_BATTERY_CHARGE] 可再生能源，但这些改良设施产出的 [ICON_Power] 电力-2。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到6个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

All renewable energy improvements in this city provide +1 [ICON_RESOURCE_JNR_BATTERY_CHARGE] Renewable energy, but -2 [ICON_Power] power for these improvements. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 6 tiles that do not already have a bonus from an Industrial Zone Tier 4 building.
可再生能源
Renewable energy
转换为可再生能源
转换为可再生能源
Convert reactor to Renewable
Convert reactor to Renewable
将城市中的发电站更换为{LOC_BUILDING_JNR_RENEWABLE_DISTRIBUTION_NAME}。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{LOC_BUILDING_JNR_RENEWABLE_DISTRIBUTION_NAME}：[NEWLINE]{LOC_BUILDING_JNR_RENEWABLE_DISTRIBUTION_DESCRIPTION}
Convert reactor to {LOC_BUILDING_JNR_RENEWABLE_DISTRIBUTION_NAME}.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{LOC_BUILDING_JNR_RENEWABLE_DISTRIBUTION_NAME}:[NEWLINE]{LOC_BUILDING_JNR_RENEWABLE_DISTRIBUTION_DESCRIPTION}
勘测站
Survey station
观星台
Observatory
公立学校
Public School
学术交流中心
Academic Exchange

Giant Telescope
大型对撞机
Hadron Collider
超级计算机
Super Computer
从建造或最后被修复开始每个时代额外+2 [ICON_Science] 科技值。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到3个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

+2 additional [ICON_Science] Science for each era since constructed or last repaired.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 3 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Campus Tier 1 building.
城市内的每种地貌为本建筑+1 [ICON_Science] 科技值。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到3个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

Each feature within this city provides +1 [ICON_Science] Science for this building.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 3 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Campus Tier 1 building.
城市内的每个山脉单元格为本建筑+2 [ICON_Science] 科技值。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到3个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

Mountains tile within this city provides +2 [ICON_Science] Science for this building.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 3 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Campus Tier 1 building.
城市内每位 [ICON_Citizen] 公民+0.5 [ICON_Science] 科技值。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到4个单元格中的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

+0.5 [ICON_Science] Science per [ICON_Citizen] Citizen in the city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 4 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Campus Tier 2 building.
本建筑额外获得与学院区的基础 [ICON_Science] 科技值相等的 [ICON_Science] 科技值。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到4个单元格中的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

This building gains bonus [ICON_Science] Science equal to the base [ICON_Science] Science adjacency bonus of the Campus district.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 4 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Campus Tier 2 building.
所有贸易路线+1 [ICON_Science] 科技值，-1 [ICON_Gold] 金币（可叠加）。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到4个单元格中的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

+1 [ICON_Science] Science and -1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for all trade routes. (Stackable)[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 4 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Campus Tier 2 building.
帝国内的每处改良过且位于学院三个单元格范围内的海洋资源（渔船与海上石油钻机）为所有海洋实验室+1科技值。[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]内卷化：每个海洋实验室使所有海洋实验室-1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到5个单元格中的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

Each improved marine resource (fishing boats and offshore oil rig) within 3 tiles of a Campus provides +1 [ICON_Science] Science for all Marine Lab in the empire. [NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]Industry competition: Each Marine Lab -1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for all Marine Labs.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 5 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Campus Tier 3 building.
帝国内的每处改良过且位于学院两个单元格范围内的陆地植物类资源（农场与种植园）为所有植物实验室+1科技值。[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]内卷化：每个植物实验室使所有植物实验室-1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到5个单元格中的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

Each improved terrestrial plant resource (farm and plantation) within 2 tiles of a Campus provides +1 [ICON_Science] Science for all Plant Lab in the empire. [NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]Industry competition: Each Plant Lab -1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for all Plant Lab.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 5 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Campus Tier 3 building.
帝国内的每处改良过且位于学院两个单元格范围内的陆地动物类资源（牧场与营地）为所有动物实验室+1科技值。[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]内卷化：每个动物实验室使所有动物实验室-1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到5个单元格中的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

Each improved terrestrial animal resource (farm, pasture, plantation, and camp) within 2 tiles of a Campus provides +1 [ICON_Science] Science for all Animal Lab in the empire. [NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]Industry competition: Each Animal Lab -1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for all Animal Lab.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 5 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Campus Tier 3 building.
帝国内的每处改良过且位于学院两个单元格范围内的陆地非生物类资源（矿山、采石场、油井）为所有化学实验室+1科技值。[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]内卷化：每个化学实验室使所有化学实验室-1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到5个单元格中的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

Each improved terrestrial nonliving resource (mine, quarry, and oil rig) within 2 tiles of a Campus provides +1 [ICON_Science] Science for all Chemistry Lab in the empire. [NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]Industry competition: Each Chemistry Lab -1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for all Chemistry Lab.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 5 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Campus Tier 3 building.
为全国范围内进行的航天项目+50% [ICON_Production] 生产力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到6个单元格中的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

+50% [ICON_Production] Production for all space projects in your empire. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 6 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Campus Tier 4 building.
为全国范围内进行的大规模杀伤性武器项目+50% [ICON_Production] 生产力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到6个单元格中的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

+50% [ICON_Production] Production for all WMD projects in your empire. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 6 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Campus Tier 4 building.
为全国范围内进行的所有项目+15% [ICON_Production] 生产力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到6个单元格中的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

+15% [ICON_Production] Production for all projects in your empire. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 6 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Campus Tier 4 building.
黄金黎明协会专属，替代大学。本建筑额外获得与学院区的基础 [ICON_Science] 科技值相等的 [ICON_Science] 科技值。此学院区域将生成等同于其 [ICON_Science] 科技值相邻加成的 [ICON_Gold] 金币。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到4个单元格中的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

Unique to the Hermetic Order, replaces the University. This building gains bonus [ICON_Science] Science equal to the base [ICON_Science] Science adjacency bonus of the Campus district. This Campus district gains bonus [ICON_Gold] Gold equal to its [ICON_Science] Science adjacency bonus.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 4 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Campus Tier 2 building
阿拉伯特色建筑。本建筑额外获得与学院区的基础 [ICON_Science] 科技值相等的 [ICON_Science] 科技值，额外获得与学院区的 [ICON_Science] 科技值相等的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到4个单元格中的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

A building unique to Arabia. This building gains bonus [ICON_Science] Science equal to the base [ICON_Science] Science adjacency bonus of the Campus district. This building gains bonus [ICON_Faith] Faith equal to the adjacency bonus of the Campus district.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 4 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Campus Tier 2 building.

葡萄牙特色建筑。城市内每位 [ICON_Citizen] 公民+0.5 [ICON_Science] 科技值。在此城中生产海军单位时+25%生产力。此城中每拥有2个海岸或湖泊单元格，则+1 [ICON_SCiENCE] 科技值。每回合+1 [ICON_GreatAdmiral] 海军统帅点数、+1 [ICON_GreatScientist] 大科学家点数。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到4个单元格中的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

A building unique to Portugal. +0.5 [ICON_Science] Science per [ICON_Citizen] Citizen in the city. +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards naval units in this city. +1 [ICON_SCiENCE] Science for every two coast or lake tiles in this city. +1 [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Great Admiral and +1 [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist point per turn. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 4 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Campus Tier 2 building

World Mining Group
本城的奢侈品资源单元格+2 [ICON_Gold] 金币。[NEWLINE]如此城尚未建有灯塔，则+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线容量。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到3个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

+2 [ICON_Gold] Gold for Luxury resources in this city. 帝国内用 [ICON_Gold] 金币或 [ICON_Faith] 信仰购买单元格和区域时打折5%费用（可叠加，至多30%）。[NEWLINE]本城允许购买区域。[NEWLINE]如此城有至少36人口，则+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线容量。[NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_MILITARY]商业竞争：每个地产开发公司使所有地产开发公司-1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到5个单元格中的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

当展示品来自不同作者时，获得主题化效果（产出加倍）。
Theming bonus doubling output when displaying objects from different authors.
填满展示牌时，自动获得主题化效果（产出加倍）。
Theming bonus doubling output when museum is full.
当展示品来自不同艺术家，且展示品的类型相同时，获得主题化效果（产出加倍）。
Theming bonus doubling output when displaying objects of the same type from different artists.
当展示品来自不同文明且时代相同时，获得主题化效果（产出加倍）。
Theming bonus doubling output when displaying [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] Artifacts of the same era from different civilizations.

美国特色建筑。 在电气时代及之后的时代，为所在城市+100% [ICON_Tourism] 旅游业绩。[NEWLINE]帝国内来自世界奇观的 [ICON_Tourism] 旅游业绩和国家公园的 [ICON_Tourism] 旅游业绩+10%（可与其他城市的相同建筑叠加）。[NEWLINE]本城来自世界奇观和国家公园的 [ICON_Tourism] 旅游业绩+10%；若剧院广场的魅力值为迷人，则+20%；若魅力值为惊艳，则+30%。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到5个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

A building unique to America. +100% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism pressure from this city towards other civilizations in and after the Modern era.[NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism from all World Wonders and National Parks in your empire (Stackable with the same building in other cities).[NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism from all World Wonders and National Parks in this city, double if the Theater district has a charming appeal, triple if the Theater district has a breathtaking appeal. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 5 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Theater Tier 3 building.

毛利特色建筑。城市中所有包含可通行地貌或自然奇观的单元格+1 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值与 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值。研究“飞行”科技后，城市中所有包含地貌或自然奇观的单元格+1 [ICON_TOURISM] 旅游业绩。维护免费；无巨作槽位。[NEWLINE]与本剧院广场相邻的单元格+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值、+1 [ICON_Faith]信仰值，若与圣地相邻则翻倍。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]其基础产出延伸到3个单元格内的所有城市（前提是其尚未从其他的此等级建筑获得加成）。

A building unique to the Māori. +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and [ICON_FAITH] Faith to all of this city's tiles with a passable feature or natural wonder. After Flight is researched receive +1 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism to all of this city's tiles with a feature or natural wonder. Costs no maintenance. Has no Great Work slots.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +1 [ICON_Faith] for tiles that are adjacent to this district, double if adhacent to a Holy Site.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Its base yields are extended to all City Centers within 3 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Theater Tier 1 building.
